mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, created_time, status, price, payment_method, address_id, pay_time, completed_time, shop_id, product_id, quantity,discount) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{created_time}, #{status}, #{price}, #{payment_method}, #{address_id}, #{pay_time}, #{completed_time}, #{shop_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity},#{discount})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id as order_id, o.created_time as date, o.status, p.product_id, p.picture_id as product_image, p.name as product_name, p.price as product_price, o.quantity as totalQuantity, (o.price * o.quantity) as totalAmount FROM orders o JOIN product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.user_id = #{user_id}
